name: Word Wizards
description:
Put your word mastery to the ultimate test in Word Wizards!

Construct words and curse your rival
Sage, a spirited wizard, has entered into a glorious game of curses against a powerful rival. With only a pool of letters at your disposal, you must help Sage by creating the longest word to complete a curse that will defeat your competitor

Gain abilities
As you progress, you will be able to steal abilities, change the letter pool, and advance towards the zenith of wizardly word power

Witness bugs
You will witness the potential of Godot_v4.0-rc1_mono_linux.x86_64, as we enjoy creating with it for the first time, but encounter difficulties (with threading in C#?) that slow the game, and face the inability to create a web build
